Bash(gh release create v1.0.9 --title "v1.0.9 - Session Persistence" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Session Persistence

Continue your work after updates or restarts with the new session commands.

### New Commands

| Command | Purpose |
|---------|---------|
| `/save-session` | Save current context for later |
| `/resume-session` | Resume from saved context |

### Seamless Update Workflow

```
/ca-update          # Saves context, runs update
                    # "RESTART REQUIRED" message
claude              # Start fresh session  
/resume-session     # Pick up where you left off
```

### How It Works

When you run `/ca-update`, CodeAssist now:
1. Saves your current task, progress, and decisions to `.claude/session-context.md`
2. Updates to the new version
3. Tells you to restart Claude

After restarting, `/resume-session` loads your context and shows:
- What you were working on
- What was completed
- What''s still pending
- Key decisions made

### Install/Update

```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/liauw-media/CodeAssist/main/scripts/install-codeassist.sh | bash
```

Full changelog: https://github.com/liauw-media/CodeAssist/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md
EOF
\)")
